response.overview: TRIPPING The Muskoka Lakes takes viewers on a three-hour boat ride along some of the most famous shorelines in Ontario. Journey past opulent cottages and boathouses. Watch steamships ply the waters just as they did a century ago. Visit long lost resorts, an historic inn, a boat-only church and an eerie shipwreck. The Muskoka Lakes are a place of contrast; a mixture of wooden heritage cottages and billionaire steel and glass cottages, stunning resorts combined with slices of pristine wilderness.
response.title: TRIPPING The Muskoka Lakes
